subject: Horse Racing
Horses
Slaughterhouses
Cruelty to Animals
lead_paragraph: Every year, thousands of thoroughbred racehorses end their careers and become economic liabilities to their owners. What happens to former stakes winners who are no longer profitable?
snippet: Every year, thousands of thoroughbred racehorses end their careers and become economic liabilities to their owners. What happens to former stakes winners who are no longer profitable?
